column2: ural language processing studies that have been
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: done over the last ten years. We used biblio-

column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: Natural Language Processing, Japan (The Asso-

column2: ciation for Natural Language Processing, 1995-
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: 2004; The Association for Natural Language Pro-
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line year tailchar-hiphen

column2: cessing, 1994-2003). Just ten years have passed
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower

column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: papers and annual conference papers on the Asso-
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ciation for Natural Language Processing, Japan.

column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: 2 Trend survey on NLP research studies
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column right-indent font-larger aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading1 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: We show the changes in the number of journal
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: papers and conference papers in Figure 1. Jour-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: nal papers are reviewed, but conference papers are
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: not reviewed in the association. In comparing the
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: journal papers and conference papers, we found
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: that the number of conference papers was much
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: larger than that of journal papers. We also found
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: that although both types of papers decreased in
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: number at some point, they both demonstrate an
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: upward trend.
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: Conference papers have a temporal peak in the
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: fourth year and a temporal drop in the sixth year,
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma column-bottom above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space
page=0 xpos=4 ypos=9 single-column left-indent right-indent font-largest column-top line-blank-line line-double-space line-space numeric-only page-bottom

column2: Figure 2: Change in the number of journal papers
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 single-column right-indent column-top string-figure headchar-capital

column2: by each research organization (The two numbers in Figure 3: Change in the number of conference pa-
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 single-column right-over font-larger aligned-line longer-tail headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: the parentheses indicate the total number of papers pers by each research organization
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 single-column right-indent font-larger aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower

column2: and the average value of published years.)
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 single-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower column-bottom above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space

column2: while journal papers have a peak in the sixth year
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified column-top line-blank-line line-double-space line-space headchar-lower

column2: and a drop in the eighth year. The temporal peak
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: and drop of the journal papers occurred just two
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: years after the peak and drop of the conference
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: papers. We presume this is because journal papers
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: need more time for reviewing and publishing, and
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: because journal papers are presented later than
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: conference papers for studies performed at the
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: same time.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Next, we investigated the change in the number
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified hanged-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: of papers put out by each research organization.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: The results are represented in contour in Figures
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: 2 and 3. The height in contour (the depth of a
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line numbered-heading1

column2: black color) indicates the number of papers. We
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: calculated the average (we call it average value)
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: of the average, the mode, and the median of the
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: published years by using the data of the number
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: of papers performed by each research organiza-
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: tion. In the figures, each research organization is
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: listed in ascending order of the average value. We
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: added the total number of papers and the average
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: value to each research organization in the figures.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: Therefore, research organizations that had many
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: papers in the earlier years are displayed higher
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: on the list, while research organizations that had
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower column-bottom

column2: many papers in the later years are displayed lower.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified column-top headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: Here, we displayed only research organizations
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: that had many total papers. If a research orga-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: nization’s name was changed during the ten-year
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: period, we used the name that had the most usage
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: on published papers for displaying it. <sup>1</sup>
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column right-indent font-largest aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower

column2: From these figures, we can see that ATR and
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: CRL (NICT) put out many journal papers, and
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-capital

column2: NTT, ATR, Tokyo Institute of Technology, CRL,
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column centered right-indent aligned-line headchar-capital tailchar-comma

column2: and the University of Tokyo put out many confer-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ence papers. We also found that while NTT and
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: ATR had many papers in the earlier years, CRL
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: and the Univ. of Tokyo had many papers in the
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: later years. We can expect that because CRL and
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the Univ. of Tokyo demonstrate an upward ten-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: dency, their quantity of papers will continue to in-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: crease in the future. Using these figures, we can
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: see very easily in which reference year each re-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: search organization put out many papers.

column3: page=4 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=4 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line

column2: 7 Conclusion
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column right-indent font-larger aligned-line line-double-space line-space numbered-heading1 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: In this paper, we described a trend survey carried
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: out on Japanese natural language processing stud-
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ies done over the last ten years. We were able to
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: investigate trend surveys on research areas very
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: easily by treating divided words in titles by a mor-
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: phological analyzer as the indications of research
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: areas. We displayed the changes in the number of
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: papers put out by each research organization and
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: written on specific research topics. We also dis-
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: played the relationship between research organi-
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: zations and research areas using the dual scaling
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: method. The simple methods we used that are de-
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column centered right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: scribed here made it possible to show many useful
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: results.
column3: page=5 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period
